Title: Quake for Windows Phone 8
Description: Port of Quake (glQuake) to Windows Phone 8 (Direct3D 11)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Port of Quake (glQuake) to Windows Phone 8 (Direct3D 11)

Quake Engine for Windows Phone 8

This project brings the "Quake Engine" from id Software to Windows Phone 8.

This is not my project. I just uploaded it here and on GitHub so that more people get aware that there is a Windows Phone 8 port of the Quake Engine. The orginial thread "glQuake d3d11 - winphone 8 port release" could be found at Windows Phone Dev Center.

All credit for this wonderful project goes to jmarshall23 at the Windows Phone Dev Center for porting the Quake Engine to Windows Phone 8 and id Software for making the source of Quake available under the GNU General Public License (GPL) v2.
